info.name: Darween ERP API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Darween ERP system. This collection includes authentication, user management, company management, subscription, and product management endpoints.

item.name: Health

request.description: Check if the API is running and healthy.

item.description: Health check endpoint to verify API availability.

item.name: Auth

request.description: Register a new user account. Returns a JWT token upon successful registration.
Authenticate a user and receive a JWT token.

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration and login.

item.name: Users

request.description: Get the currently authenticated user's profile information.
Update the currently authenticated user's profile information.
List all users belonging to a specific company.

item.description: User management endpoints for viewing and updating user information.

item.name: Companies

request.description: Create a new company. The authenticated user becomes the admin of the company.

response.name: Success

request.description: Get all companies associated with the authenticated user.

response.name: Success

request.description: Get details of a specific company by ID.

response.name: Success

request.description: Update company information. Only admins can update company details.

response.name: Success

request.description: Add a user to a company with a specific role. Only company admins can add users.
Remove a user from a company. Only company admins can remove users.

item.description: Company management endpoints for creating, viewing, updating companies and managing company users.

item.name: Product Variants

request.description: Create a new variant for the specified product.

response.name: Success

request.description: Retrieve all variants for the specified product.
Retrieve a specific product variant.
Update an existing product variant.

item.name: Stock Management

request.description: Set the exact stock level for a product variant. Requires Manager, Admin, or Owner role.
Adjust the stock level by adding or subtracting from the current amount. Requires Manager, Admin, or Owner role.

item.description: Stock management endpoints for updating and adjusting product variant stock levels.

item.name: Subscriptions

request.description: Get the subscription details for a specific company.
Update the subscription plan for a company. Only company admins can update subscriptions.

item.description: Subscription management endpoints for viewing and updating company subscription plans.
